articles.title: The Pixel 8 and Pixel 8 Pro represent peak smartphone design - XDA Developers
articles.description: Google fully revealed the Pixel 8 and Pixel 8 Pro, and these devices feature the best design we've ever seen on smartphones.
articles.content: Smartphone fans and reviewers flocked to praise Apple for making the iPhone 15 series more comfortable to hold, after years of boxy and angular iPhone releases. But while Apple is only just now figur… [+4566 chars]

articles.title: Woman's bowel cancer disappears thanks to 'miracle' drug - BBC
articles.description: Carrie Downey's bowel cancer disappeared within six months of taking dostarlimab.
articles.content:
A woman has been given the all-clear from cancer after being treated with a drug described as a "miracle".

articles.author: Tom Hale
articles.title: Over 500 Fish Have Rapidly Evolved In A Single Lake Thanks To Hybridization - IFLScience
articles.description: Hybridization and genetic recycling have led to an explosion of cichlid diversity in Lake Victoria.
articles.content: The Lake Victoria of today is relatively young at just 16,000 years old, but within this tiny timeframe, some 500 different species of cichlid fish have managed to evolve here. Remarkably, this explo… [+4415 chars]
